trans-unit.source: Contains the parameters that are used to create an <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> object using the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder parametere som brukes til å opprette en <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> objektet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.%23ctor%2A> konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: This structure is used only in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> object constructor call.
trans-unit.target: Denne strukturen brukes bare i det <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>objekt Konstruktørkall.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: The properties whose values are established by this structure are not directly exposed on <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> instances when an <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som inneholder verdiene som er opprettet av denne strukturen vises ikke direkte på <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>forekomster når en <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>bygges.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: However, the values of the HwndSourceParameters structure typically affect general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] properties such as "Height" and "Width" that might exist in specific hosted objects and their [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i strukturen HwndSourceParameters vanligvis påvirker imidlertid generelle [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] egenskaper for eksempel "Høyde" og "Bredde" som kan finnes i bestemte vertsbaserte objekter og deres [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Do not construct instances of this structure using the default (parameterless) constructor.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Ikke konstruere forekomster av denne strukturen med (parameterløs) standardkonstruktør.

trans-unit.source: An HwndSourceParameters instance that is created by the default constructor results in HwndSourceParameters that cannot be assigned a <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.WindowName%2A> (even though the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.WindowName%2A> property appears to be settable).
trans-unit.target: En HwndSourceParameters-forekomst som er opprettet av standard konstruktør resultatene i HwndSourceParameters ikke kan tildele en <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.WindowName%2A>(selv om den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.WindowName%2A>egenskapen vises skal angis).</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.WindowName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.WindowName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If such an instance is applied as the parameters for an <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> constructor, the resulting <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>cannot display a window.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en slik forekomst brukes som parametere for en <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>konstruktøren, den resulterende <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>kan ikke vise et vindu.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> class with a specified window name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> klassen med et angitt Vindusnavn.

trans-unit.source: The window's name.
trans-unit.target: Vinduets navn.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> class with a specified window name and initial size.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> klassen med et angitt Vindusnavn og en opprinnelig størrelse.

trans-unit.source: Do not pass 0 (zero) for either the `width` or `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Ikke bestått 0 (null) for den `width` eller `height` parametere.

trans-unit.source: Although the method eventually succeeds, even if you do pass 0, a significant performance penalty occurs.
trans-unit.target: Selv om metoden oppgavestatusen lykkes, selv om du sende 0, oppstår en betydelige forsinkelse.

trans-unit.source: The window's name.
trans-unit.target: Vinduets navn.

trans-unit.source: The window's width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Vinduets bredden i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The window's height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Vinduets høyden i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that determines whether to acquire Win32 focus for the WPF containing window when an <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som bestemmer om å hente Win32 fokus for WPF som inneholder vinduet når en <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to acquire Win32 focus for the WPF containing window when the user interacts with menus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Du kan skaffe deg Win32 fokus for WPF som inneholder vinduet når brukeren samhandler med menyene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the value of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.DefaultAcquireHwndFocusInMenuMode*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>bruke verdien av <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.DefaultAcquireHwndFocusInMenuMode*>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.DefaultAcquireHwndFocusInMenuMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the nonclient area for sizing.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil inkludere i nonclient området for størrelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Window> class sets this parameter to `true` when using this structure internally, as part of its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] window-creation process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Window>klassen angir denne parameteren til `true` når du bruker denne strukturen internt som en del av den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] vinduet Opprettelsesprosessen.</xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the layout manager sizing logic should include the nonclient area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis transportbehandling oppsettet størrelse logic bør inkludere nonclient-området. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this structure is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om dette er likt det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: This implementation checks all members (public and private) of both structures for exact value equality.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen kontrollerer (offentlige og private) alle medlemmer i begge strukturer for likhet, nøyaktig verdi.

trans-unit.source: The objects to be tested for equality.
trans-unit.target: Objekter som skal testes for likhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the comparison is equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdiene er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this structure is equal to a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om denne strukturen tilsvarer et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: This implementation checks all members (public and private) of both structures for exact value equality.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen kontrollerer (offentlige og private) alle medlemmer i begge strukturer for likhet, nøyaktig verdi.

trans-unit.source: The structure to be tested for equality.
trans-unit.target: Strukturen som skal testes for likhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structures are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis strukturene er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the extended [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] styles for the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den utvidede [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] stiler for vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The extended window styles.
trans-unit.target: De utvidede vinduet stilene.

trans-unit.source: See [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98462) for a list of these styles.
trans-unit.target: Se [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98462) en liste over disse malene.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 (no extended window styles).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 (ingen utvidede vindusstiler).

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for denne <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This implementation uses the Object implementation of GetHashCode.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen bruker objektet implementeringen av GetHashCode.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: En 32-biters heltall med fortegn hash-kode.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a size was assigned.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en størrelse er tilordnet.

trans-unit.source: If a size was not assigned, the window has the default size.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en størrelse ikke er tilordnet, har vinduet standardstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: Calls to <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.SetSize%2A> or setting <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Height%2A> all result in this property being `true`.
trans-unit.target: Kall til <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.SetSize%2A>eller innstillingen <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Width%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Height%2A>alle føre til at denne egenskapen blir `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.SetSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the window size was assigned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis størrelsen på ble tilordnet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, unless the structure was created with provided height and width, in which case the value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, hvis strukturen ble opprettet med angitte høyden og bredden, der tilfellet verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the height of the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir høyden på vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen-region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you specify this window size in device pixels, not the typical device-independent units.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til de fleste metoder som utnytter rektangel område på skjermen mål i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], du angir denne vindusstørrelse i enheten piksler, ikke vanlige uavhengig av enheten enhetene.

trans-unit.source: If you need to size your window to its content, set <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på din vindu til innholdet, angi <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not set Height to 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: Ikke angi høyde til 0 (null).

trans-unit.source: Doing so incurs a significant performance penalty in rendering.
trans-unit.target: Dette innebærer en betydelige forsinkelse i gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: The height of the window, in device pixels.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på vinduet i enheten piksler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message hook for the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir meldingen-binding for vinduet.

trans-unit.source: This message hook is enabled before `CreateWindow` is called so that it receives all the window creation messages.
trans-unit.target: Denne meldingen-binding er aktivert før `CreateWindow` kalles slik at den mottar Windows oppretting-meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The message hook for the window.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen-binding for vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure is equal to another <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> er lik en annen <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: This implementation calls the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kaller for denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Equals%2A>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> strukturen til å sammenligne.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: Andre <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> strukturen til å sammenligne.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structures are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis strukturene er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure is not equal to another <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> er ikke lik en annen <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: This implementation calls the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Equals%2A> method and inverts the result.
trans-unit.target: Kaller for denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Equals%2A>metoden og Inverterer resultatet.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> strukturen til å sammenligne.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"></xref> structure to compare.
trans-unit.target: Andre <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSourceParameters"> </xref> strukturen til å sammenligne.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the structures are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis strukturene ikke er like. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window handle (HWND) of the parent for the created window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vinduet håndtaket (HWND) for det overordnede området for vinduet opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The HWND of the parent window.
trans-unit.target: HWND for det overordnede vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left-edge position of the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den venstre kant posisjonen i vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The left-edge position of the window.
trans-unit.target: Venstre kant plasseringen av vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The default is CW_USEDEFAULT, as processed by `CreateWindow`.
trans-unit.target: Standard er CW_USEDEFAULT, som behandles av `CreateWindow`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the upper-edge position of the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen øvre kant av vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The upper-edge position of the window.
trans-unit.target: Øvre kant plasseringen av vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The default is CW_USEDEFAULT, as processed by `CreateWindow`.
trans-unit.target: Standard er CW_USEDEFAULT, som behandles av `CreateWindow`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how WPF handles restoring focus to the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvordan WPF håndterer gjenoppretting fokus til vinduet.

trans-unit.source: WPF automatically tries to restore focus to the window unless RestoreFocusMode is set to <xref:System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode>.
trans-unit.target: WPF prøver automatisk å gjenopprette fokus til vinduet med mindre RestoreFocusMode er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies how WPF handles restoring focus for the window.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som angir hvordan WPF håndterer gjenoppretting fokus for vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values that are used for the screen position of the window for the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdiene som brukes til skjermen plasseringen av vinduet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position of the left edge of the window.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til venstre kant av vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The position of the upper edge of the window.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til det øvre kanten av vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Sets the values that are used for the window size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdiene som brukes til størrelsen på den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen-region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you specify this window size in device pixels, not in the typical device-independent units.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til de fleste metoder som utnytter rektangel område på skjermen mål i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], du angir denne vindusstørrelse i enheten piksler, ikke vanlige uavhengig av enheten enhetene.

trans-unit.source: If you need to size your window to its content, set <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på din vindu til innholdet, angi <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not pass 0 (zero) for either the `width` or `height` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Ikke bestått 0 (null) for den `width` eller `height` parametere.

trans-unit.source: Although the method eventually succeeds even if you do pass 0, a substantial performance penalty occurs.
trans-unit.target: Selv om metoden lykkes oppgavestatusen selv om du sende 0, oppstår en betydelig ytelse forsinkelse.

trans-unit.source: The width of the window, in device pixels.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på vinduet i enheten piksler.

trans-unit.source: The height of the window, in device pixels.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på vinduet i enheten piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parent windows of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> should be considered the non-client area of the window during layout passes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om de overordnede vinduene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> anses som ikke-klient-området i vinduet under Oppsett formidler.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if parent windows of the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> should be considered the non-client area of the window during layout passes.; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis overordnet windows for den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> anses som ikke-klient-området i vinduet under Oppsett formidler.; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> should receive window messages raised by the message pump via the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> skal motta vindusmeldinger oppstå meldingen pumpe via den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> should receive window messages raised by the message pump via the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> skal motta vindusmeldinger oppstå meldingen pumpe via den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.ComponentDispatcher"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> corresponds to a top-level window; otherwise, the default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> tilsvarer et vindu på øverste nivå; ellers standard er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel opacity of the source window content is respected.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om respekteres per pikselbredden tettheten for vinduet kilden.

trans-unit.source: By enabling per-pixel opacity, the system no longer draws the non-client area.
trans-unit.target: Ved å aktivere per pikselbredden tetthet tegner systemet lenger-klient-området.

trans-unit.source: The opacity is used when the window is drawn on the desktop (it represents a final rendering step and does not appear as a contributor to property values such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Opacity%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Tettheten brukes når vinduet tegnes på skrivebordet (den representerer en endelig gjengivelse trinn og vises ikke som bidragsyter egenskapsverdiene som <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Opacity%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: UsesPerPixelOpacity applies only to top-level windows.
trans-unit.target: UsesPerPixelOpacity gjelder bare for vinduer på øverste nivå.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if using per-pixel opacity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du bruker per pikselbredden tetthet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that declares whether the per-pixel transparency of the source window content is respected.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om respekteres per pikselbredden gjennomsiktigheten for vinduet kilden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if using per-pixel transparency; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du bruker per pikselbredden gjennomsiktighet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the width of the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir bredden på vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Unlike most methods that take rectangle screen region measures in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you specify this window's size in device pixels, not in the usual device-independent units.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til de fleste metoder som utnytter rektangel skjermen område mål i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], du angir denne vindusstørrelse i enheten piksler, ikke vanlige uavhengig av enheten enhetene.

trans-unit.source: If you need to size your window to its content, set <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre størrelsen på din vindu til innholdet, angi <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource.SizeToContent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not set Width to 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: Ikke angi bredden til 0 (null).

trans-unit.source: Doing so incurs a substantial performance penalty in rendering.
trans-unit.target: Dette innebærer en betydelig ytelse forsinkelse i gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: The window width, in device pixels.
trans-unit.target: Vindusbredden, i enheten piksler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class style for the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] klasse stil for vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The window class style.
trans-unit.target: Stilen vinduet klasse.

trans-unit.source: See [Window Class Styles](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178417) for detailed information.
trans-unit.target: Se [vinduet klassen stiler](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178417) mer detaljert informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 (no window class style).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 (ingen vinduet klassen stil).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The window name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the window.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stilen for vinduet.

trans-unit.source: By default, the following bits are set when the structure is created: WS_VISIBLE; WS_CAPTION; WS_SYSMENU; WS_THICKFRAME; WS_MINIMIZEBOX; WS_MAXIMIZEBOX; WS_CLIPCHILDREN.
trans-unit.target: Følgende biter er angitt som standard når strukturen opprettes: WS_VISIBLE; WS_CAPTION; WS_SYSMENU; WS_THICKFRAME; WS_MINIMIZEBOX; WS_MAXIMIZEBOX; WS_CLIPCHILDREN.

trans-unit.source: For a standard window, you must set the WS_CLIPCHILDREN bit.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi WS_CLIPCHILDREN-biters et vanlig vindu.

trans-unit.source: This style bit is enforced in the code itself; if you omit to set this flag, WPF adds it to whatever value you provide.
trans-unit.target: Denne malen biten håndheves i koden seg selv. Hvis du utelater angir dette flagget, WPF legger til den verdien du angir.

trans-unit.source: The window style.
trans-unit.target: Vindusstilen.

trans-unit.source: See the [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98462) function for a complete list of style bits.
trans-unit.target: Se den [CreateWindowEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=98462) funksjonen for en fullstendig liste over stilen biter.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks for defaults.
trans-unit.target: Se merknader for standarder.
